name: PaperAct Solutions
tag_list: scanning, cloud, document-management, filing, software-as-service, scan-to-cloud
overview:
PaperAct builds versatile and feature rich Cloud and Appliance based solutions for the filing, organising, processing and online access of documents for People and Business

Your Documents Anywhere , Anytime, Any Device

The PaperAct EFC (Electronic Filing Cabinet) is a state-of-the-art online filing solution that lets you store, organise and access all your documents from any device anywhere in the world.

Consolidating your online and offline filing systems, PaperAct EFC incorporates everything from your paper documents to your important emails, attachments and faxes, securely filing all your documents in the cloud so you never have to waste time or money searching through filing cabinets again.

By combining intelligent character recognition with powerful search options, PaperAct EFC creates a complete digital index of all your physical and digital files that can be found and accessed quickly and easily. The PaperAct EFC offers a secure connection to its service through a web browser, so thereâ€™s no software to install and your files can be accessed through any device connected to the internet, from your smartphone to your tablet to your PC or Mac.

The intelligent PaperAct EFC system not only gives you secure universal access to all of your files, but it also saves you time and money by simplifying the filing and retrieval process. You can add files to your EFC by email, by scanning files or by photographing documents with your smartphone, and PaperAct will automatically analyse, index and store it for you. No more bulky filing cabinets overtaking your office, no more lost files and no more wasted energy on finding documents.
